intro.1: Before you start your&adventure, there is&something I must tell.{sleep 280}{event 0}
intro.2: Please sit down and&pay attention, as this&is very important.{sleep 280}{event 0}
intro.4: Japari Park is an zoo&of wonders and dreams,&where everyone lives&happily after.{sleep 320}{event 0}
intro.5: Although foes have&existed throughout all&these years, those bad&times were kept low.{sleep 320}{event 0}
intro.6: And every decade, new&FRIENDS are born with&the power of SANDSTAR,&alongside anomalies...{sleep 320}{event 0}
intro.7: And... perhaps{event 1} a&human by a rare chance?{sleep 800}{event 2}
